properties.rationale: General Ledger and Financial Reporting Data Store maps directly to sys-107 (Billing & Revenue Management System), which is the financial system of record for Rackspace billing, revenue, and financial reporting functions.
properties.assumption: ERP/GL system is the Billing & Revenue Management System; could also include Oracle ERP or SAP not separately identified in KG

properties.rationale: Law Enforcement Request and Disclosure Report Store contains sensitive legal documents (law enforcement requests, disclosure reports). sys-068 (Microsoft 365 Suite / SharePoint) is the corporate document management platform used for legal and compliance document storage at Rackspace.
properties.assumption: Legal documents stored in SharePoint/OneDrive within M365; a dedicated legal matter management system may exist but is not in the KG

properties.rationale: Authorized Sub-Processor Registry and DPA Store contains legal/compliance documents (Data Processing Agreements, sub-processor lists). sys-068 (Microsoft 365 Suite / SharePoint) is the platform for corporate legal document management and compliance record-keeping at Rackspace.
properties.assumption: Sub-processor registry and DPAs stored in SharePoint/compliance management system within M365; a dedicated GRC tool may hold these records

properties.rationale: Board and Corporate Governance Document Repository contains board meeting minutes, governance documents, resolutions, and committee charters. sys-068 (Microsoft 365 Suite / SharePoint/OneDrive) is the enterprise document management platform at Rackspace for corporate governance records.
properties.assumption: Board documents may also use a dedicated board portal (e.g., Diligent Boards); M365/SharePoint is the most probable internal storage system in the KG

properties.rationale: BGP Routing Table and Peering Configuration Store is a direct name match for sys-016 (AS12200 BGP Edge Router Cluster), which manages Rackspace's Border Gateway Protocol routing tables, peering relationships, and ASN configuration.
properties.assumption: BGP routing tables stored on the edge router cluster management plane

properties.rationale: Cloud Office DNS Zone and Domain Registration Store contains DNS zones for Cloud Office domains (emailsrvr.com, rackspace.com). sys-008 (Cloud DNS API) is the Rackspace DNS system that hosts and manages authoritative DNS zones for customer and Rackspace-owned domains.
properties.assumption: Cloud Office DNS zones are managed within the Cloud DNS API platform; domain registration may additionally use an external registrar

properties.rationale: RackConnect Global Virtual Circuit Configuration Store is a direct name match for sys-024 (RackConnect Global MPLS Control Plane), which manages virtual circuit definitions, MPLS configurations, and network topology state for RackConnect Global.
properties.assumption: Virtual circuit configuration data stored in the RackConnect Global MPLS Control Plane management database

properties.rationale: Infrastructure Automation Toolbox Terraform State Store directly names Terraform state as its content. sys-088 (Terraform Enterprise) is the Terraform platform that manages and stores Terraform state files for infrastructure-as-code deployments across Rackspace multi-cloud environments.
properties.assumption: Terraform state stored in Terraform Enterprise backend (S3-compatible or internal state store)

properties.rationale: ObjectRocket Platform Metadata and Container Image Store directly matches sys-041 (ObjectRocket Container Registry), which stores container images and platform metadata for the ObjectRocket managed database services.
properties.assumption: Container images stored in ObjectRocket Container Registry; platform metadata stored in associated MongoDB/PostgreSQL database

properties.rationale: Recursive DNS Query Log and Cache Store directly names the Rackspace caching DNS resolver fleet as its source system. sys-047 (Caching DNS Resolver Fleet) is the system that generates and stores recursive DNS query logs and cache entries.
properties.assumption: Query logs stored locally on the resolver fleet nodes and/or forwarded to the corporate syslog aggregation system

properties.rationale: HIPAA Business Associate Agreement and PHI Processing Registry contains compliance contracts and PHI processing records. sys-100 (ServiceNow ITSM Platform) is the primary compliance and contract management system at Rackspace for tracking BAAs, compliance obligations, and regulatory records.
properties.assumption: BAAs and PHI registry may also be stored in a dedicated contract management or GRC system not in the KG; ServiceNow is the most likely platform given its role as the primary compliance tracking tool

properties.rationale: DFARS CUI Compliance and CDI Assessment Data Store contains government compliance assessment records. sys-100 (ServiceNow ITSM Platform) serves as the GRC and compliance tracking platform at Rackspace for regulatory frameworks including FedRAMP and DFARS.
properties.assumption: DFARS compliance assessments may also reside in a dedicated FedRAMP compliance management system; ServiceNow is the nearest matching platform in the KG

properties.rationale: ESG Sustainability and Carbon Emissions Data Repository contains environmental reporting data used for SEC ESG disclosures. sys-068 (Microsoft 365 Suite / SharePoint/OneDrive) is the enterprise document and data management platform most likely hosting ESG data at Rackspace.
properties.assumption: ESG data may also reside in a dedicated sustainability reporting platform (e.g., Watershed, Salesforce Net Zero Cloud); M365/SharePoint is the most probable internal repository in the KG

properties.rationale: IRAP Assessment and CCSL Certification Evidence Store contains Australian government certification evidence. sys-100 (ServiceNow ITSM Platform) is the compliance evidence management system at Rackspace for regulatory certifications including FedRAMP, IRAP, and ISO 27001.
properties.assumption: IRAP evidence may be managed in a dedicated audit management system; ServiceNow is the closest matching compliance platform in the KG

properties.rationale: Corporate Restructuring and Transformation Program Data contains program management documents and data related to Rackspace's restructuring initiatives. sys-068 (Microsoft 365 Suite / SharePoint/Teams) is the corporate collaboration and document management platform used for program management at Rackspace.
properties.assumption: Transformation program data may also reside in project management tools (e.g., Jira, MS Project); SharePoint/M365 is the most probable primary document repository in the KG

properties.rationale: Managed Data Warehouse and Analytics Pipeline Metadata Store contains metadata for customer-managed analytics workflows. sys-001 (Rackspace Customer Portal Fabric) is the platform that hosts managed services metadata and customer analytics pipeline configurations as part of the Fabric service delivery platform.
properties.assumption: Analytics pipeline metadata could alternatively reside in a dedicated data catalog or MLflow/Airflow system; Fabric is assigned as the primary managed services platform in the KG

properties.rationale: Rackspace Cyber Recovery Cloud Backup and IRE Configuration Store directly names 'Rackspace Cyber Recovery Cloud powered by Rubrik' as the platform. sys-114 (Rubrik Cyber Recovery Cloud) is the exact matching system storing immutable backup replicas, IRE configurations, and recovery playbooks.
properties.assumption: Data asset explicitly references Rubrik CDM and Recovery Orchestration Database as its format, directly matching sys-114

properties.rationale: Technology Market Research and Industry Survey Data Repository contains analyst reports, market research data, and survey results. sys-068 (Microsoft 365 Suite / SharePoint/OneDrive) is the most likely internal repository for market research documents at Rackspace.
properties.assumption: Market research data may be stored in dedicated research platforms (e.g., Gartner portal, IDC access) or shared drives; M365/SharePoint is assigned as the internal document repository proxy in the KG

properties.rationale: Anti-Bribery and Trade Sanctions Compliance Records contain legal compliance records for FCPA, UK Bribery Act, and trade sanctions. sys-100 (ServiceNow ITSM Platform) is the compliance tracking and GRC platform at Rackspace most likely storing these compliance records.
properties.assumption: Anti-bribery and sanctions records may also reside in a dedicated compliance platform (e.g., NAVEX EthicsPoint, SAP GRC); ServiceNow is the nearest matching system in the KG

properties.rationale: Churn Risk Prediction Model Data Store contains ML model training data, feature stores, and prediction outputs for customer churn risk. sys-061 (Rackspace AI Business Platform) is the AI/ML platform most likely hosting the churn prediction model data and associated feature engineering pipelines.
properties.assumption: Churn risk predictions may also be surfaced through sys-066 (Salesforce CRM) as the customer-facing system; sys-061 is assigned as the AI model training and serving platform

properties.rationale: Consolidated Enterprise Data Warehouse contains integrated financial, operational, and customer data consolidated from 70+ data warehouses (per Rackspace internal documentation). sys-107 (Billing & Revenue Management System) is the primary financial data platform and most likely foundation for the consolidated enterprise data warehouse.
properties.assumption: The consolidated EDW may be a separate Snowflake/Redshift/BigQuery instance not independently identified in the KG; sys-107 is assigned as the nearest financial data platform proxy

properties.rationale: Customer Success Analytics Dashboard Data contains customer health scores, engagement metrics, and NPS data surfaced to customer success teams. sys-066 (Salesforce CRM Platform) is the system of record for customer relationship data and the most likely host for customer success analytics dashboards at Rackspace.
properties.assumption: Dashboard data may also be stored in sys-061 (RAISE AI platform) or a dedicated BI tool (Tableau, Power BI); Salesforce is assigned as the primary customer success platform in the KG

properties.description: AI Business Platform stores ICE impact calculation and scoring data
Atlassian Confluence stores enterprise knowledge base content
CrowdStrike Falcon stores EDR telemetry data
Microsoft Defender VMDR stores vulnerability findings
Microsoft Purview DLP stores policy and violation data

properties.context: Harbor Container Registry stores all container images and metadata

properties.description: Prometheus stores time-series metrics data
Grafana stores dashboard and alert state data
MariaDB Galera hosts Keystone identity database
MariaDB Galera hosts Nova compute database
MariaDB Galera hosts Neutron network database
MariaDB Galera hosts Cinder block storage database
MariaDB Galera hosts Glance image registry database
MariaDB Galera hosts Barbican secrets database
MariaDB Galera hosts Heat orchestration database
MariaDB Galera hosts Octavia LB database
MariaDB Galera hosts Ironic bare metal database

MariaDB Galera hosts OpenStack Skyline dashboard database
RabbitMQ cluster hosts all OpenStack inter-service AMQP message queues

properties.description: AI Launchpad stores customer training datasets
AI Launchpad stores fine-tuned model artifacts
AI Launchpad healthcare vertical stores HIPAA-regulated clinical datasets
RITA stores responsible AI assessment and governance data
AI Anywhere Private Cloud stores customer GPU workload data
Microsoft Sentinel stores SIEM data lake

properties.context: Memcached cluster stores Keystone token and session cache
Longhorn distributed storage manages all Kubernetes persistent volumes
cert-manager manages TLS certificates stored as K8s Secrets

properties.description: Prometheus AlertManager stores alert state data

properties.context: Vault Enterprise stores and manages all secrets, PKI, and encryption keys

properties.description: PagerDuty Operations Cloud stores incident and on-call operations data
Snowflake Data Cloud stores enterprise analytics data warehouse
